message.burnngrind.furnaceplus1.header: This is a more advanced furnace that can be upgraded for more speed. It has one slot

message.burnngrind.furnaceplus3.header: This is a more advanced furnace that can be upgraded for more speed. It has three slots
message.burnngrind.furnaceplus4.header: This is a more advanced furnace that can be upgraded for more speed. It has four slots
message.burnngrind.basic_speed_upgrade.h: This upgrade will increase the processing speed with 50%
message.burnngrind.super_speed_upgrade.h: This upgrade will increase the processing speed with 100%
